author: Jon Kamp
title: Otto Warmbier’s Parents Sue North Korea
text:
The parents of Otto Warmbier, the U.S. college student who died last year after returning home from North Korea, sued the country on Thursday and said their son was “brutally tortured and murdered.”
Among the claims in the parents’ civil complaint, filed in U.S. District Court in Washington, D.C. are wrongful death and assault and battery.
Mr.... RELATED VIDEO Video Shows Otto Warmbier in North Korea Before Detention A video released by Otto Warmbier’s brother shows the U.S. student with his tour group in North Korea in January 2016, just before he was detained for allegedly defacing a political poster. Photo: Austin Warmbier (Originally Published June 16, 2017)
